scripts.docker:build: docker build -t evc -f ./devops/Dockerfile --memory-swap -1 --memory 4g --build-arg NODE_ENV=prod --build-arg REACT_APP_GIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) .
scripts.docker:push: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 115607939215.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com; docker tag evc:latest 115607939215.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/evc:latest; docker push 115607939215.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/evc:latest
scripts.ecs:update:portal: aws ecs update-service --cluster evc --service evc-portal --force-new-deployment --region us-east-1
scripts.ecs:update:daemon: aws ecs update-service --cluster evc --service evc-daemon --force-new-deployment --region us-east-1
scripts.sync:schema:prod: aws ecs run-task --cluster evc --task-definition evc-sync-schema:4 --region us-east-1 --launch-type "FARGATE" --network-configuration "awsvpcConfiguration={subnets=[subnet-cfd34dee],securityGroups=[sg-6add9660],assignPublicIp=ENABLED}"
scripts.release: pnpm docker:build && pnpm docker:push && pnpm ecs:update:portal && pnpm ecs:update:daemon && pnpm flush
